name: Thunder Bagua
text: Counter: Up to 1 of your Leader or Characters gains +4000 Power during this battle. Then, if you have 2 or less cards in your life area, place up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less face down at the top or bottom of their Life.
